## semverDefaultPolicy variable

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Standard semver policy for general API compatibility.

Rules: - Removals are always breaking (major) - Required parameter additions are breaking (major) - Type narrowing is breaking (major) - Optionality changes are breaking (major) - Optional additions are non-breaking (minor) - Type widening is non-breaking (minor) - Deprecations are patch-level - Equivalent changes have no impact

**Signature:**

```typescript
semverDefaultPolicy: Policy
```
